attributes.title: Honey no just no

attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and show support for Mr.Trump however when i entered the app it wasnâ€™t at all what i was expecting. I immediately was met with disgusting graphic images of a man that seems to have died his skin orange and is extremely obese. Due to the fright this caused I quickly closed the app only to find that the background on my phone had been changed to one of these images and my camera roll was now full of them. Additionally the words vote for donald trump began to play out of my speakers and it was impossible to stop. Due to this I realized the app had unleashed a virus onto my device in order to attempt to brainwash me into voting for Trump. I deleted the app immediately and I recommend no one downloads this app and falls for the trick. Please stay safe everyone and god bless your souls.
